cause.description:
you know how many cases are reported each year for abuse. particualry child abuse. its said that every day four children under the age of 4 will die each day to child abuse. could you only imagine how many lives could be saved if we just step up and help those who are to scared to get help themselves.
1. they dont deserve what is being done to them..EVER!
cause.mission: Stop it before we loose another life
cause.name: Abuse
